description:
Join pagesection.com as a motivated and experienced SEO Guest Posting & Outreach Freelance specialist remotely. NOTE: This is a part-time/contractual posting and applicants will receive payment based on ethical acquisition of back-links/guest-posts on external websites. The aim is to improve PageSection's SEO ranking.

In this role, you will be responsible for identifying guest posting opportunities, building relationships with publishers and bloggers, and securing high-quality backlinks through ethical outreach strategies.


Key Responsibilities:
- Research and identify high-authority websites relevant to target industries for potential guest posting opportunities.
- Initiate and manage ongoing outreach campaigns using personalized and strategic communication.
- Build and nurture relationships with editors, bloggers, and webmasters to secure content placement and collaborative opportunities.
- Negotiate terms with publishers, ensuring compliance with site guidelines and quality standards.
- Coordinate to develop and deliver engaging guest post content tailored to each publication.
- Track, report, and analyze outreach performance, including placement success rates and link quality.
- Stay updated on SEO, content marketing, and link-building best practices to inform outreach strategy.

Requirements:
- Proven experience with guest posting and email outreach within SEO or digital marketing environments.
- Familiarity with content creation processes and editorial standards.
- Strong communication and relationship-building skills.
- Ability to analyze site metrics (DA, DR, traffic, etc.) to evaluate link opportunities.
- Organized, self-motivated, and able to manage multiple outreach campaigns simultaneously.
- Proficiency with outreach and SEO tools such as Ahrefs, SEMrush, or similar platforms is a plus.

This is a freelance, remote position offering flexible work hours. We are looking for someone who is results-driven, detail-oriented, and eager to contribute to impactful SEO strategies. If you have experience in ethical guest-posting for online SaaS projects, kindly contact us via team@pagesection.com or visit the website pagesection.com for more information.



Please mention the word **SPOTLESS** and tag RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA== when applying to show you read the job post completely (#RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA==). This is a beta feature to avoid spam applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this and see they're human.
